name: Pizza toppings
description: Here are our top 12 favourite pizza toppings! This list will continue to grow, at which point I'll start creating separate recipes for each pizza. For now, enjoy this handy 12-in-1 list! Also see - homemade pizza dough  (dough and cooking) and pizza sauce recipe. No yeast? No worries! Make this Magic No Yeast Pizza Dough.
recipeIngredient: 1  pizza base ((28cm / 11" base, see separate recipe))
1/3 cup bacon (, cut into 1 x 3cm (1/2 x 2”) pieces)
1/3 cup beef mince (ground beef) (, formed into 1cm (1/2”) balls)
2/3 cup ham (, cut into 2 x 0.5cm (1 x 1/4") batons)
1/2 cup pineapple (, cut into small chunks)
3 tbsp barbecue sauce (instead of pizza sauce)
1/3 cup bacon (, cut into 1 x 3cm (1/2 x 2”) pieces)
1/3 cup beef mince (ground beef) (, formed into 1cm (1/2”) balls)
1/3 cup ham (, cut into 2 x 0.5cm (1 x 1/4") batons)
12  medium raw prawns/shrimp (, shelled and deveined)
2 tsp long red chillis (, sliced finely)
3/4 cup pork sausage (, skin removed, torn into 12 or so little balls (raw))
1 1/2 cups kale (, stems removed, torn into pieces (raw))
125g / 4.4oz  fresh buffalo mozzarella (, very well drained)
Capricciosa recipe ((separate recipe with video tutorial))
1 heaped cup mozzarella cheese (, freshly grated)
1/2 cup sliced provolone cheese (, torn into pieces)
1/3 cup blue cheese (, broken into 1.5cm (1/2”) pieces)
1 tbsp olive oil (, plus extra for drizzling)
1 tbsp fresh rosemary leaves (picked, loosely packed)

review.reviewBody: Pepperoni and Pineapple, Sweet and Spicy. Love the No yeast pizza dough.

Santa gifted a 14 x 16 pizza stone, so this NYE is pizza night! Inspired by RTE, here’s the plan:

1. The Neapolitan (pizza alla puttanesca) with chilli oil drizzles
2. Bacio (Margherita) with pesto kisses
3. Lucky countries (🇨🇦 bacon, 🇦🇺 pineapple) with maple syrup ripples
 
Now to make the dough for OUTDOOR FRIDGE – FLAVOUR DEVELOPMENT 😋

All the best for ‘24!

Made my 1st from scratch pizza dough. 600gm flour was bit to much for my processor so dough didn't get a big workout. Have frozen 2/3 for next time. Piled base high with toppings and cooked for 10 minutes, should have gone 15 for crispier finish. I'm so delighted with myself. Thx for making it sound easy!
Thanks for the recipe. Daughter loved the garlic butter prawns topping. You’re the best Nagi!
This is an excellent article on pizza toppings. It's a great guide as I intend to mix and match the toppings.
